import React from 'react' const AdminForm = ({ id: key, majRecette, recettes }) => { const recette = recettes[key] const handleChange = (event, key) => { const { name, value } = event.target const recette = recette[key] recette.name } return(
handleChange(e, key)} type="text" name="nom" placeholder="Nom de la recette" />
